Header: SF-West Launches Blood Donation to Mark its 7th Anniversary
Content: More than 400 plus troops to coincide with the 7th anniversary of the Security Forces HQ- West donated their blood at the Security Force Headquarters - West (SFHQ - West) on Friday (3). It was held at Sri Bodhirajaramaya (Army Temple) and the National Blood Bank officials cooperated with troops for organizing it. On the interaction of Major General Mahinda Mudalige Commander SFHQ-West, Brigadier General Staff and Brigadier Admin and Quartering of the SFHQ-West supervised the arrangement closely.
